item.title: MalovMetaArt Metaverse
item.description:
About This Game

MalovMetaArt is a metaverse of world art, a digital museum that allows you to view the digital twins of world masterpieces that are identical to their physical counterparts.

The key distinction among MalovMetaArt and similar projects is the 100% accurate replication of artworks. Using photogrammetry and laser scanning techniques, we have created a way to create precise digital twins of the masterpieces of world art you see in the app. You can even touch, zoom and examine the artworks from all sides. In virtual space, you can hold an item (which is not allowed in a real museum) or get up close to unique paintings, so close that they can see the texture of each touch of the genius’s brush.

Non-traditional exhibition galleries are another feature of MalovMetaArt. Here you may admire glass artworks exhibited under the starry sky of faraway planets, as well as masterpieces of painting in a subway hall of mid-20th century.

Many of us don't frequently visit regular museums. So, give a go to a virtual one. You'll like it. Furthermore, MalovMetaArt Metaverse is better and more convenient than a traditional museum in many aspects.

item.title: Beacon Patrol: First Horizons
item.description:
About This Game

Beacon Patrol: First Horizons is a relaxing strategy game with endless possiblities.

Steer your Coast Guard ship and build your own coastal map one tile at a time.

Get more tiles by exploring and keep building indefinitely as long as you can keep scoring.


Start with your ship at the Coast Guard HQ and you build your map from there.

On your turn you place up to three tiles, connecting to the tile your ship currently occupies. Tiles must not be rotated and all their edges have to match.

After placing a tile you immediately move your ship onto it. By spending one of your tokens you can take an additional movement to a connected tile.

You score points for each tile that is connected to other tiles on all four sides. For scored points you receive new tiles to continue your journey.

The game ends after allavaialble tiles have been played.


Beacon Patrol: First Horizons combines the look and feel of a board game with the endless posibilities of a digital experience.

Experience this cozy and strategic game at any time.

The clear and cute art style lets you enjoy the coast and the sea from where ever you are.

item.title: Siheyuan
item.description:
About This Game

SIHEYUAN is a single and local co-op action-puzzle game of few words, but lots of tiles. Move the falling blocks, pass them and pass them again to fill the grid, in this minimalistic test of coordination for 1-4 players of any age, inspired by the tradition of "siheyuan", historical courtyards of Beijing, China.



Juggle tiles between the 4 game areas in single-player mode, or pass them to your friends in multiplayer mode (up to 4P), talking, collaborating, and sharing (or shouting) your strategy.



• 13 different levels to unlock
• 13 special modifiers, changing the game's pace from meditative to hectic
• Unique minimalistic abstract design inspired by Chinese traditional architecture, color theory, opera, and games.

item.title: Hand In Hand
item.description:
About This Game

Hand In Hand is a 2D split screen puzzle platformer, where the player can control two characters at once, or two players can play in co-op mode on one device.

A TOUCHING STORY


Two soulmates live in a fairytale world. But when evil came to their world, they lost each other. Now both of them need to head towards each other, facing many difficulties and dangers along the way. And only by finding a fragile connection between one another and going hand in hand will they be able to defeat evil and meet again. It's a story about how we can help one another even when you're apart, and be far from one another even when you're nearby. It's a story about the importance of relationships and mutual support. But every story has an even deeper meaning...

SPLIT SCREEN


The game works in splitscreen mode, with one character on each screen in their respective locations. The game has two modes. The first is single-player mode, where one player simultaneously controls both characters with one joystick. In this mode, the player must demonstrate sophisticated controller skills. The second is local co-op mode, where two players control the characters using two joysticks. Here, both players control their respective characters. Each mode has its advantages. Single-player mode requires you to show great dexterity and reaction speed, and co-op mode allows you to feel the joy of playing the game with your family or friend. Try both game modes, we hope you'll like it and enjoy completing it.

THE CHARACTERS INTERACT WITH AND HELP EACH OTHER


Each character has their own part of the level in a common location. However, some parts of the level are interconnected. This means that the characters can interact and help each other complete the level. Characters can move keys and objects from one part of the screen to another, and most puzzles are need to be solved by both characters working together, connecting parts of the screen and solving puzzles together.

EPIC BOSSES


The game has epic boss battles. Each boss represents the world of shadows that has invaded this fairytale forest and wants to plunge all the inhabitants of this fairytale world into the horror of eternal darkness. Our brave heroes, Lina and Minho, must defeat each of the bosses so that peace and prosperity will once again reign in the fairy forest. Boss battles take place without splitscreen, and are designed to be played by just one of the characters, so each character must defeat their evil shadow bosses.

PUZZLES


On their way through the collapsing fairy-tale world, the characters will constantly encounter various puzzles like closed doors, laser beams with reflectors, ancient mechanisms and ruins, labyrinths, and caves full of dangers. Our heroes will be able to overcome all difficulties, but each will have to make every effort to pass these trials and help their companion.

item.description:

Dive into the spine-chilling world of Scary School Simulator 2, where the serene facade of Sakura High School conceals dark secrets and eerie mysteries. item.title: American Isekai: Legends of Nipponia

80-120 hours of gameplay depending on the player.

Equipment upgrading.

Monster Taming.

item.title: The Paupers
item.description:
About This Game


Step into a world between worlds, where the ethereal and the earthly collide in a whimsical yet haunting adventure. In The Paupers (formerly Dziady), players assume the enigmatic role of a spectral custodian, tasked with aiding lingering souls' transition to the afterlife. This game ventures into the surreal, guiding players through a spectral realm teeming with lost spirits.

In The Paupers, players immerse themselves in the art of spectral listening, tuning into the peculiar requests of these ghostly inhabitants. The challenge lies in fulfilling their varied and often bizarre needs, whether it's an alcoholic beverage or a long-forgotten comfort food.

The journey through The Paupers is a delicate balance of empathy, wit, and a touch of spookiness. Engaging with these lost spirits unveils layers of stories and unmet desires, each request illuminating a fragment of their past lives.

The game's unique charm lies in serving these spectral needs while exploring the intricate stories behind the spirits' presence. It's not merely about supplying items - it's about connecting with these lost souls, understanding their wishes, and ultimately guiding them toward peace in the afterlife.

But don't think it's too serious! It's a Halloween-themed spooky fun game, blending eerie encounters with delightful humor for an entertaining gaming experience.

Features

  • Dynamic Spirit Encounters: Engage with a variety of spirits, each with unique needs, personalities, and requests.

  • Halloween-Themed Spooky Comedy: Embrace the Halloween spirit with a balance of spine-chilling atmospheres and humorous encounters, blending spooky elements with lighthearted and funny interactions with the spirits, creating an entertaining and uniquely themed gaming experience.

item.title: The Highrise
item.description:
About This Game

The first alien beings did not fall from heaven.

They come from beneath the ground.

They destroyed everything on the earth on their first appearance.


THE HIGHRISE is a first-person survival game set in a high-rise building that has been sealed off by an alien monster invasion. Gather resources to make fighting weapons and survival tools. You must find and send a rescue signal at the end of your desperate survival.

Feel the void and abandoned highrise building


Prior to this apocalyptic era, facilities such as shopping malls, offices, and residences, which were previously crowded with people, were very familiar and friendly spaces to us. But, now, they will inspire fear in a sense of emptiness and heterogeneity that no one can find. Furthermore, it is a space created by inspiring real skyscrapers, and the space that is vacated or omitted has been minimized. Players will feel that every floor and facility in the building will have the appearance of a very real space.

SHHH! Beware of noise caused by carelessness.


The monster sniffers responsible for humanity's extinction have a highly developed sense of hearing and smell. They can detect even the smallest movements, coughs, and gurgling sounds from your stomach. Moreover, if there is a loud noise, such as glass breaking or falling from a great height, the sniffers will rush to the player.

GO DOWN AND DOWN! Find out more and better resources.


To avoid the monster sniffers, the last survivor stayed near the top floor of a building. The player used to be a linker, connecting these survivors to the food court in the building's basement. Use this knowledge to your advantage. The lower floors you go, the more resources you have and the more efficient you are. However, as they get closer to the ground, the monsters become more powerful and the number of monsters increases. But you never know; you may find any hints to help you escape from the downstairs.



KEY FEATURES



* Hunger and thirst must be controlled. However, be cautious of food poisoning. Food poisoning survivors are likely to be pursued by sniffers.

* You can obtain resources by destroying most of the building's furniture. For a much more efficient acquisition, use tools that are specific to the material of each piece of furniture.

* Make and install the tools required for survival. You can carry a still to purify dirty water, a cooktop to boil food, and a workbench to craft survival tools.

* You can avoid monsters by sneaking between them, but you can also create weapons to fight them. Crafting each appropriate tool and weapon for combat and infiltration allows you to work more efficiently.

* A ventilation system connects all of the building's floors and rooms. This is the only safe zone from the group of monsters, and it is entirely up to the player. Remember the layout and flow of this area.

* There are a total of 6 playable characters, each with different stats and passive skills.

* Single-player and multiplayer for up to 4 players (up to 8 players in custom mode) are available. In multiplayer, there will be balance adjustments based on the number of players.

* There will be Sandbox mode, Survival mode, and Custom mode. In Sandbox mode, infinite lives are guaranteed, and there will be resource respawns. However, in Survival mode, you can experience the true challenge of the game with limited resources and a one-time life. In Custom mode, you can configure various options according to the difficulty level you desire.
